“I am confident the next 25 years will deliver more promises, passion and achievements as we work together.” #WaitangiDay
“On #WaitangiDay we remember when our nation-building began, and we celebrate the hope and optimism our forebears must have felt.”
“If we choose a new flag, it will serve us in times of celebration and remembrance, like #WaitangiDay.”
“This milestone year in our history is a good time to discuss the flag, formally and respectfully.” #WaitangiDay http://t.co/4mrkG9Uhi1
“I believe many New Zealanders feel the same, that the flag captures a colonial and post-colonial era whose time has passed.” #WaitangiDay
“In 2040, I’d like to see a new New Zealand flag raised at the #WaitangiDay dawn service.”
“I’m a firm believer in the current process, which is addressing the wrongs done in the past to help Māori build their futures” #WaitangiDay
“Settled iwi are creating success stories. They see the post-settlement environment as their chance to shape their own destiny” #WaitangiDay
“The Crown has now signed 72 deeds of settlement – 46 of those in the past six years.” #WaitangiDay
“I am confident that when we celebrate the bicentenary of the Treaty signing in 2040, we will look back to today & be proud.” #WaitangiDay
“He iwi tahi tātou – we are one people.” #WaitangiDay http://t.co/61NHvR66RD
“The generosity of Māori, & the good faith of both people, has led to the NZ we know today, and to the relationship we share.” #WaitangiDay
“Māori and Pākehā alike, have developed a Treaty partnership which is admired around the world.” #WaitangiDay http://t.co/vl07yv9g2D

"Together, let’s keep working for New Zealand!" #TeamKey
"Our country is firmly on the right track. Our party is in good heart. Our government is delivering strong & stable leadership." #TeamKey
"Taken together, these roading projects represent a significant new commitment in our regions." #TeamKey
"That’s why today I am pleased to announce a package of 14 regional roading projects across the country." #TeamKey
"On good roads you get better public transport, more efficient freight movement, faster journeys & safer trips for NZ families." #TeamKey
"Over the last six years, our Government has invested heavily in vital infrastructure to make up for years of underinvestment." #TeamKey
"This election is going to be much, much tighter than many people realise. We’re going to have to work hard for every vote." #TeamKey
"The future is positive for New Zealand. National is the party for people who care about that future." #TeamKey
"We made a commitment to the people of Canterbury on day one and we will not waver from it." #TeamKey
"Our policies will build on the strong foundations we’ve laid over the last six years." #TeamKey
"We’ll continue to focus attention on what matters. And we’ll continue to support Christchurch through the rebuild." #TeamKey
"Work offers the sort of independence, opportunity and self-esteem that a life on welfare never can." #TeamKey
"It’s under a National-led government that around 1,500 people a week are coming off welfare and into work." #TeamKey
"I’m in politics because I care about other New Zealanders, particularly those families who need a hand to pick themselves up." #TeamKey
"I’m proud to say that we’re the party that’s bringing in free doctors’ visits and prescriptions for children under 13." #TeamKey
"We’re increasing paid parental leave, we’re boosting support for families with new-born children." #TeamKey
"The Government is ensuring that families share the dividends of that growth." #TeamKey
"We have a plan, and that plan is working for New Zealand. Over the last year an extra 84,000 jobs were created." #TeamKey
"People are confident they can make a difference in their own lives, & that their children and grandchildren have good prospects." #TeamKey
"A strong economy isn’t an end in itself. It’s a way of delivering the things people care most about." #TeamKey
"And next year, after all we’ve been through as a country, I’m proud to say that the Government’s books will be back in the black." #TeamKey
"Getting it back on track has been tough. But this month we recorded the third-highest growth rate in the developed world." #TeamKey
"Your efforts are crucial in this election. And I know that what motivates me also motivates you." #TeamKey
"I want to thank all the National Party volunteers who’ll be busy in the coming weeks." #TeamKey
"I want to thank my wife Bronagh for her support and encouragement – I couldn’t do it without you." #TeamKey
"Together, we are providing stable government that’s making a real difference for New Zealanders." #TeamKey
"Doesn’t it feel good to be a member of the National Party?" #TeamKey
